scripts.build: npm run build-toolkit && npm run build-styleguide
scripts.build-toolkit: cat pages/assets/scss/toolkit.scss | node_modules/.bin/node-sass --include-path node_modules/ --output-style compressed > pages/assets/css/toolkit.css
scripts.build-styleguide: cat pages/assets/scss/styleguide.scss | node_modules/.bin/node-sass --include-path node_modules/ --output-style compressed > pages/assets/css/styleguide.css
scripts.update-pages: rm -r -f node_modules/sky-toolkit-core && rm -r -f node_modules/sky-toolkit-ui && npm install && npm run build
